response.overview: The documentary “Águas da R-existência: stories of life and struggle in Chapada Diamantina”, covers the municipalities of Utinga, Wagner, Lençóis, Mucugê and Piatã, portraying the processes of territorialization and the conflicts and struggles over land, territory and water that Traditional populations have been competing against the advance of agribusiness and mining. Struggles that, in addition to involving struggles for land, territory and water, are struggles for existence, autonomy and the reproduction of life in and from Chapada Diamantina of these traditional populations.
response.title: Águas da R-existência
